sqlMap.sql: select b.* from ( select rownum r, JOBS_NO, MEM_ID, JOBS_TITLE, JOBS_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(JOBS_REGDATE, 'MM/DD/YYYY') jobs_regdate, JOBS_GROUP, JOBS_DEPTH, JOBS_SEQ, JOBS_STATUS, JOBS_STARTDATE, JOBS_ENDDATE, JOBS_HIT from ( SELECT * FROM JOBS_BOARD) a ) b
sqlMap.insert:
select JOBSBOARDSEQ.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into JOBS_BOARD (jobs_no, mem_id, jobs_title, JOBS_CONTENT, JOBS_REGDATE, JOBS_STARTDATE, JOBS_ENDDATE, JOBS_HIT) values (#jobs_no#, #mem_id#, #jobs_title#, #jobs_content#, sysdate, #jobs_startdate#, #jobs_enddate#, 0)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE JOBS_BOARD SET jobs_title = #jobs_title#, jobs_startdate= #jobs_startdate#, jobs_enddate= #jobs_enddate#, jobs_content = #jobs_content# where jobs_no = #jobs_no#
update JOBS_BOARD set JOBS_HIT = JOBS_HIT + 1 where JOBS_NO = #jobs_no#
